nl.utwente.ewi.qwirkle.client

Class UserInputThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • nl.utwente.ewi.qwirkle.client.UserInputThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UserInputThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This Thread handles the user input when using the TUI view. This enables us to chat while it is not our turn.
